title: Book.Of.Mormon.Original.Cast.Meh.Quality.CroBar
description:
The Book of Mormon Original Cast on Broadway. Found this cam copy floating around, its the best quality I've found with Andrew Rannells. This is not shot by myself. Pretty bummed I didn't see it with the original cast, but the current touring cast put on a pretty good show when I saw it live. 

Anyway Enjoy.   A6V3 Sorry its not better.

The Book of Mormon is a religious satire musical with book, lyrics, and music by Trey Parker, Robert Lopez, and Matt Stone. Best known for creating the animated comedy South Park, Parker and Stone co-created the music with Lopez, a co-composer/co-lyricist of Avenue Q.

The Book of Mormon tells the story of two young Mormon missionaries sent to a remote village in northern Uganda, where a brutal warlord is threatening the local population. NaÃƒÂ¯ve and optimistic, the two missionaries try to share the Book of Mormon, one of their scripturesÃ¢â‚¬â€which only one of them has readÃ¢â‚¬â€but have trouble connecting with the locals, who are more worried about war, famine, poverty, and AIDS than about religion.
